definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Wrap the ball of dough with greaseproof wrapper and chill it for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把和好的麪糰用保鮮膜包好，放入冰箱鬆弛30分鐘。

sentences.english: Place the chicken breast on cutting board, with one sheet of plastic film under it, and cover it with another sheet.
sentences.chinese: 將雞胸肉放置在砧板上，上下各鋪一張保鮮膜。

sentences.english: Turn the dough out into a lightly oiled bowl. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a damp towel.
sentences.chinese: 放到一個抹了薄油的盆裏，改上保鮮膜或溼毛巾。

sentences.english: Mix until it is completely incorporated. Wrap and chill for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用保鮮膜包好入冰箱鬆弛30分鐘。

sentences.english: The forth: Flatten a piece of mixture with two preservative films.
sentences.chinese: 用兩張保鮮膜夾着用手直接壓成皮。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a preparation method and an application of an active fruit-vegetable fresh-keeping film.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種活性果蔬保鮮膜的製備及應用。

sentences.english: You don't really own Tupperware, you store food in bowls or pots covered in plastic wrap.
sentences.chinese: 你不買特百惠，你的食物都放在包保鮮膜的碗裏。

sentences.english: Cover with a plastic wrap and chill overnight or at least 3 hours.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上保鮮膜冷藏隔夜或至少3小時。

sentences.english: Household goods ranging from toilet paper to clingfilm wereflung into the street from outdoor shelves in front of a drugstore.
sentences.chinese: 一家百貨商店的貨品從廁紙到保鮮膜散落一地。

sentences.english: The tensile strength, thermal sealing strength and moisture permeability of the moisture-permeable film were tested.
sentences.chinese: 測試了該保鮮膜的拉伸強度，熱合強度以及透溼性能。

sentences.english: Place the dough in an oiled bowl and cover with plastic wrap.
sentences.chinese: 容器抹上少許油脂，放入麪糰蓋上保鮮膜。

sentences.english: Wrap tightly in plastic if storing overnight.
sentences.chinese: 如果想存放過夜的話就用保鮮膜裹緊。

sentences.english: Why did you put Clingfilm on it?
They are also added to wrapping films for food products as an anti-clouding agent.
sentences.chinese: 應用在食品用保鮮膜上時還可以當防霧劑。

sentences.english: Cover the dough with a plastic wrap and top with a wet towel.
sentences.chinese: 麪糰蓋上保鮮膜後再鋪條溼布巾。

sentences.english: Cover the dough with a plastic wrapper or a damp towel and let rest for about 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 麪糰用溼布或是保鮮膜蓋好，靜置鬆弛30分鐘。
